rules.name: myRule_3
rules.label: Asset Linked or Entitlement Address changed

Flow.description: This Process Builder is responsible to Sync updates from Entitlement to Customer Entitlement (i.e Address, MAC Address or Name change) SDS-2853,SDS-2432

value.stringValue: ISCHANGED([Entitlement].Street_1__c ) || ISCHANGED ([Entitlement].Street_2__c ) || ISCHANGED([Entitlement].City__c ) || ISCHANGED([Entitlement].State__c ) || ISCHANGED([Entitlement].Country__c ) || ISCHANGED([Entitlement].Zip_Postal_Code__c ) || ISCHANGED([Entitlement].MAC_Address__c ) || ISCHANGED([Entitlement].Name )

AND([Entitlement].AssetId<>null,OR(ISCHANGED([Entitlement].Street_1__c ) || ISCHANGED ([Entitlement].Street_2__c ) || ISCHANGED ([Entitlement].Street_3__c ) || ISCHANGED ([Entitlement].Street_4__c ) || ISCHANGED([Entitlement].City__c ) || ISCHANGED([Entitlement].State__c ) || ISCHANGED([Entitlement].Country__c ) || ISCHANGED([Entitlement].Zip_Postal_Code__c ) ))

Flow.label: Service Cloud : Sync Changes to Customer Entitlement and Asset Address

recordUpdates.name: myRule_5_A1
recordUpdates.label: Update Env Profile on Cust Entitlement
